channel	forward	backward
π⁻π⁰$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁻	0.9992560958809754	0.9986499517839923
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁰	1.0106075216972035	1.007742113238738
π⁰π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁺	0.9915415346466456	0.9922027827524453
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$σ	1.001894572606709	1.0079126267691965
2$\times$(π⁰π⁰$\leftrightarrow$σ)	1.0005572272372674	0.9896355733868271
# SMASH-1.6
